post:
Hey,

This is our first email hosting post here. This service is powered by MXRoute. 
Free migration from your previous email provider is included with all plans now*.
<br>
**Dedicated Email Hosting: Mail-4G**

* 4GB Storage Space
* Unlimited Domains
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* SMTP, IMAP, POP3 Protocols
* Roundcube, Rainloop, CrossBox Clients
* High Reputation IP's
* 300 Outbound Emails / Hour
* Automated email compression: Increases mail storage capacity
* Mobile App for IOS & Android
* Free NextCloud Integration + 10GB storage
* [Unique Outbound Infrastructure](https://mxroute.com/our-unique-outbound-infrastructure/ "Unique Outbound Infrastructure") highest mail-delivery rates.

This plan is generally £7.5/year but **for LET it is £4.5/yr** now! Stock is limited.
Use **coupon code: LET-MAIL**
Link: https://webhorizon.in/clients/order/main/index/email
> Want more storage? Now get Mail-10G plan with 10GB email storage at ~~£15~~ £9/year coupon **LET-MAIL**
<br>
A good deal. Discount is recurring. Valid for 20 orders only.
Free Email Migration should be applied within 3 days of service purchase via ticket. This is offered complementary & is meant for small migrations. For larger migrations/multiple mailboxes please contact us.
<br>
**Payment Methods**:-

* PayPal Payments
* Cards via Stripe Payments
* BTC payments
* RazorPay (INR Payments)
Any doubts or questions please PM or ask here. 
<br>
Thanks for Reading,
Abdullah
